name: ChivvyDateParser
description: This is a template jsdom component. It shows how to use most of the functionality available in a js dom component.

input.name: data
input.description: An input that takes in Chivvy event data.

output.name: errorMsg
output.description: Outputs error message if there is one.

output.name: transformedData
output.description: An output that returns the transformed data when there is no error.

output.name: hasError
output.description: Shows if there was an error in data parsing.

output.name: badData
output.description: An output that returns bad data.

output.name: goodData
output.description: An output that returns good data.
